title: Shopping: Groceries (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Groceries subcategory within Shopping. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: Why don't you buy more groceries next time?
cards.romaji: Tsugi wa mo chotto shokuryo o katta ho ga ii n ja nai?
cards.japanese: 次はもう少し食料を買ったほうがいいんじゃない？

cards.english: I always buy too many groceries when I am hungry.
cards.romaji: Watashi wa onaka ga suite kaimono ni iku to itsumo shokuryo o kaisugite shimau.
cards.japanese: 私はお腹が空いて買い物に行くといつも食料を買いすぎてしまう。
